page.title: 11Yeovil Street Market.
page.content: About 50 stalls selling materials, clothes,fruit & veg,meat,shoes,tools, electrical things,flowers,fish etc, are set up every Friday on an area of ground at the junction of South St and Petters Way.The stalls are run by shopkeepers from places like Dorchester,Sherborne,Sturminster Newton & Castle Cary.It costs them about Â£8 perday in rent, and the man who collects it is called a toby. It is very busy,we counted 200 people entering in 10 minutes,mostly regular shoppers from Yeovil, but some from a long way away. On other days the stalls move to places like Dorchester,Bridport and Salisbury. It is a good place to buy things because they are cheap.
